name: Railroaded
description:
Shortly after arriving at an ordinary train station, some crazy flying weirdo kidnapped someone close to you and set an army of zombies on you.

Unprepared, you would have died then and there if another weirdo hadn't shown up through a shiny hole saying:

"I'm from the future, have a magic whistle."

They tossed you 2 ordinary looking whistles and you chased the strange flying man into the street and prepared to fight the army of zombies as time rifts started to crack open the street.

Now you must survive an onslaught of zombies, close the timerifts and avoid the Zones of Evil the strange flying man creates on the road.

Use your magic whistle to stun rows of enemies and run them over with a magic train from nowhere.

Mow down rows of enemies for multipliers.

Hold your position on timerifts to gain more and more points.

And above all...

Survive.

  • Kill zombies... with trains
  • Kill a bunch of zombies with one train for a score multiplier
  • Navigate the everchanging Zones of Evil
  • Blood or no blood, your choice
  • Play alone or with a partner
  • Post scores to twitter directly from game
  • Local arcade style score tables
  • Seriously... zombies... killed by trains
  • Suitable for most ages
  • You don't got to pay if you don't want to... you want to though right, have a heart, unlike these zombies

This game includes an instructions option in the main menu and flash help to teach you how to play, though an average gamer should have no difficulty figuring things out.

Never the less, played by keyboard:

WASD Keys: Move
Q Key: Stun Whistle, Summon Train
F Key: Pause
